headline: New for Virtual DNS Customers: Self-Service Dashboard and APIs, and Two New Features

description: Today we're launching two new features and a brand new dashboard and API for Virtual DNS. Virtual DNS is CloudFlareâ€™s DNS proxy that sits in front of some of the largest hosting providers in the world, shielding their DNS infrastructure from attacks.
